description.value:
The artificial brain an android possesses can allow better compatibility with infospheres and direct downloads of information. An android with this trait has a built-in @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.equipment.Item.5GM9QlhUd1EB1LjJ]{Comm Unit} that can be accessed without needing to use their hands. Once per day, whenever the android takes a 10-minute rest to regain Stamina Points, they can choose one Intelligence-, Wisdom-, or Charisma-based skill. The chosen skill becomes a class skill for them, and they gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.dkDzFtHOTXLnJivf]{Skill Focus} as a bonus feat with that skill. This decision lasts until the next time the android uses this trait.

This replaces exceptional vision.
